short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An universal utility to help you chat better on Facebook and Messenger

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables you to do translation directly and naturally on social network's interfaces.
- You can translate your comment directly in comment fields.
- You can translate your messages directly in message input box.
- You can translate any received messages with just a click.
- Translate any comment to your desired language.

Please note:
- Preferred language is your familiar language. Comments and Messages will be translated to this language.
- Target language is your unfamiliar language, in a conversation, this is your peer's language.
